mapper.select: SELECT CBC_NUM, CBC_CONTENT, CBC_ACTIVE, CBC_CREDAT, CBC_CRETIM, CBC_LMODAT, CBC_LMOTIM, CBC.UI_NICKNAME, CB_NUM, CBC.UI_NUM FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD_COMMENT CBC INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON CBC.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM WHERE CB_NUM = #{cbNum} AND CBC_ACTIVE = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_BOARD_COMMENT SET CBC_CONTENT=#{cbcContent}, CBC_LMODAT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), CBC_LMOTIM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%r') WHERE CBC_NUM = #{cbcNum} AND CB_NUM = #{cbNum} AND UI_NUM = #{uiNum}
